class Solution:
    def shortestDistanceAfterQueries(self, n: int, queries: List[List[int]]) -> List[int]:
        ans = []
        nodes = list(range(n))
        
        for start, end in queries:
            start_idx = bisect.bisect_right(nodes, start)
            end_idx = bisect.bisect_left(nodes, end)
            
            # Remove the nodes in the range (start, end)
            del nodes[start_idx:end_idx]
            
            # Append the number of remaining nodes - 1 to ans
            ans.append(len(nodes) - 1)
        
        return ans
